org.openlcb

Class AddressedPayloadMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.Message
      • org.openlcb.AddressedMessage
        • org.openlcb.AddressedPayloadMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpenLcb
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatagramAcknowledgedMessage, DatagramRejectedMessage, OptionalIntRejectedMessage, ProtocolIdentificationReplyMessage, ProtocolIdentificationRequestMessage, SimpleNodeIdentInfoReplyMessage, SimpleNodeIdentInfoRequestMessage, StreamDataCompleteMessage, StreamDataProceedMessage, StreamInitiateReplyMessage, StreamInitiateRequestMessage, TractionControlReplyMessage, TractionControlRequestMessage, TractionProxyReplyMessage, TractionProxyRequestMessage

    public abstract class AddressedPayloadMessage
extends AddressedMessage
    Common base class for Addressed messages carrying a payload. This base class is easy to serialize and deserialize from an interface like CAN. Created by bracz on 12/29/15.
